actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide for paper money of the United States to carry a designation in braille indicating the denomination.

summary.text: Provides that paper money of the United States shall carry a designation, after January 1, 1974, in braille indicating the denomination.

titles.title: A bill to provide for paper money of the United States to carry a designation in braille indicating the denomination.
